attributes.action: Strongly urge the Secretary of State for Business to petition Royal Mail to create a seperate postcode for the town of Dunstable
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Instead of sharing the LU postcode that is associated with Luton, it is about time that the town of Dunstable had its own postcode, it would be a very welcome move for all.
